en-US.summary: Classic Bagel number guessing game.  Guess a three digit number, and Alexa will give you hints about what digits are correct.
en-US.name: Basic bagels Game
en-US.description: Play the class Bagel number game!  Guess a three digit number (such as one hundred and three or four five six).  Alexa will say 'Pico' if one digit is correct, but in the wrong place, 'Fermi' if one digit is correct and in the correct place, or 'Bagels' if no digit is correct.  Then guess again until you find the correct number.  She will also tell you how many times you have played.
